orderItem表位于db0中，order表位于db1中，在ShardingSphere-Proxy开启XA事务模式之后，两个库的binlog如下（省略了一些多余的信息）：

db0

```
......
XA START X'3139322e3136382e3132332e3137352e746d313633333135393939373732373030303038',X'3139322e3136382e3132332e3137352e746d3135',1096044365
......
### INSERT INTO `demo_ds_0`.`t_order_item`
### SET
###   @1=107030773630631938
###   @2=107030773624143873
###   @3=107030773630631939
###   @4=107030773630631940
###   @5='100.00'
###   @6=1
......
XA END X'3139322e3136382e3132332e3137352e746d313633333135393939373732373030303038',X'3139322e3136382e3132332e3137352e746d3135',1096044365
......

......

```

db1

```
......
XA START X'3139322e3136382e3132332e3137352e746d313633333135393939373732373030303038',X'3139322e3136382e3132332e3137352e746d3134',1096044365
......
#211002  7:33:17 server id 2  end_log_pos 629 CRC32 0x30af78e7  Write_rows: table id 108 flags: STMT_END_F
### INSERT INTO `demo_ds_1`.`t_order_3`
### SET
###   @1=107030773624143873
###   @2=1
###   @3='Guangdong Province, Guangzhou city, Tianhe district'
###   @4=1
###   @5='100.00'
###   @6=1633159997927
###   @7=1633159997927
......

#211002  7:33:17 server id 2  end_log_pos 930 CRC32 0xf3189bd5  XA PREPARE X'3139322e3136382e3132332e3137352e746d313633333135393939373732373030303038',X'3139322e3136382e3132332e3137352e746d3134',1096044365
XA PREPARE X'3139322e3136382e3132332e3137352e746d313633333135393939373732373030303038',X'3139322e3136382e3132332e3137352e746d3134',1096044365
......
XA COMMIT X'3139322e3136382e3132332e3137352e746d313633333135393939373732373030303038',X'3139322e3136382e3132332e3137352e746d3134',1096044365
```

从binlog中可以看到orderItem和order两个在不同数据库中的表，按照XA事务的流程保存了数据，与预期一致，并且使用的MySQL是5.7.34版本，可以看到记录了XA PREPARE操作在binlog中，修复了之前XA事务丢失的问题。
